Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 839
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Legendarynemasis@...

Deep in the atlantic at the second Infecticon base, Blight storms up 
to Darkfate as he begins to pulse a bright green. His paitience worn 
thin the Infecticon begins to give off tremendous heat that in itself 
would make Darkfates circuits sizzle.

Blight: "Where the hell are your men!? If they're not here in five 
minutes I am going to reduce you to a crater and then when your men 
do arrive I will have them blasted out of the water!"

Elsewhere, at the Infecticon ship, the Oblivion, Frostbite begins to 
ponder the bots of the Island. She cackles to herself as she thinks 
of the things she could do and then opens a channel to the Alliance's 
two bases.

Frostbite: "This is commander Frostbite of the infecticons, I would 
like to know if your faction would like to ally ourselves. We have 
much to offer you technologically..."
